content:
I've sent out invitations for the May meeting, but I need to move it to the 8th because of holiday/may 1st, so look for an update soon.

Meanwhile, we can discuss agenda in this thread.

Hi,
One "boring" but quite useful thing to decide on is some form of common guidelines when creating national profiles and extensions:

-pattern for naming them/setting the canonical URL, versioning etc
-formal policies when creating them (ie "don't create something that already exists" and "don't put use case specific stuff in extensions, do that in profiles instead" and similar things that would increase the overall quality)
-what metadata to fill in (status, publisher, useContext etc)

I assume a lot of this is something we could steal from work being done in other countries or work streams, but it's stuff that we all should have to deal with at one point or another and it's most likely quite country independent and would therefor be a suitable thing to solve together.

EDIT: It may very well be so that there is work done in Norway, Denmark and/or Finland that we could agree upon being the "nordic" way of handling these kind of questions.

The agenda topic could be to decide on IF and HOW we push this and similar topics forward.
The temporary link to the IG for the danish telemedicine setup: https://ehealth-documentation.s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/latest/ig/index.html
We need agenda proposals for the upcoming call - what do you want to discuss next wednesday?
One topic could be 'what do we want to talk about in Stockholm' :-)
.... looking forward to seeing you all tomorrow!

At the beginning of the nordic meeting today I mentioned the difference in what sections are part of the eH DSI (former epSOS) CDA specs, the former version of the eHealth Network Guidelines (back when they spoke of mandatory/optional sections) and finally the CEN IPS (as it looked in november when we did this summary): Sections.png
what does it mean that IPS has no optionality?
ain't anything that isn't listed as 'R' optional?
In the IPS column the blanks should say "Required if Known"
Bye. And thanks for setting up the Skype link! Great discussion
Did you set the date for the next call? That is, will we have a call on the first Wednesday of July?
I've been on a long vacation. I'll invite for a call September 4th.
